overview:
Jane Thompson is CEO and founder of HelloPulse Inc â€“ a new lifestyle and entertainment business focused on connecting like-minded singles.

Previously she served as Managing Director, International for NASDAQ listed, IAC (InterActiveCorp). In this capacity, she was responsible for overseeing IACâ€™s global expansion efforts and reported directly to Barry Diller.

Ms. Thompson has held a number of senior roles within IAC-owned businesses including Senior Vice President of Global Mergers and Acquisitions and Business Development for Match.com, where she led acquisition efforts in China, France and Australia. Preceding this she served as Vice President and General Manager of Match.com North America, with full operational and financial responsibilities for the US business. From 2003 to 2005, Ms Thompson was responsible for the Match.com Australia and New Zealand operations before being promoted to Vice President and Managing Director of Match.com Asia Pacific where she led the growth into China, Taiwan and Korea.
